medical_history.chief_complaint: Photosensitivity and skin fragility resulting in blistering on the dorsal hands and forearms.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 2 months after the initiation of terbinafine treatment, with complaints of skin fragility and blistering. After discontinuation of the medication, examinations identified erosions and scarring, with hypertrichosis present over the temples.
medical_history.family_history: Family history included an alcoholic father with porphyria cutanea tarda (PCT).
medical_history.social_history: Patient admitted to drinking heavily (12 beers per day) during a weekend trip spent fishing in the sun.
